Posts.Content: Hi my name is Andrea in 2002 I had a double mastectomy by choice and had cancer in 5 lymph nodes. It would be Breast cancer in the lymphnodes not lymphoma. Find out what stage your cancer was and how many nodes were positive then sign up for your course of chemo. I have 8 months chemo and 7 weeks of radiation. Breast cancer can metastisize to other areas that is why chemo is important. Get a book on helping you through this process so you can be well educated in your treatment options. I'm still well and healthy it has been 2 years. Andrea
Posts.Title: Unsure of What to Ask

Posts.Content: Hi ! I just had a thorecotomy and removal of my upper right lobe of my lung. I am a stage 2 A breast cancer survivor and have been on Arimidex since 2003. They found 2 tiny nodes on my chest wall with breast cancer cells. They have changed my med to faslodex. I had my first shot this week. She does not recomend chemo but put me on this . Are you happy with this drug and do you think it works? Nervous..in Arizona :)
